Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides for the appointment of foreclosure receivers and managing agents in N.Y. city
Summary: Provides for the appointment of foreclosure receivers and managing agents in cities having a population of one million or more.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to the appointment of receivers in actions to foreclose a mortgage
